title: QT5 with dbus failing build process
body:
Hi 

I am trying to build qt5 with dbus and it's failing with error.

```
qt/package.py:339, in configure:
     322      @when('@5.7:')
     323      def configure(self):
     324          config_args = self.common_config_args
     325
     326          if not sys.platform == 'darwin':
     327              config_args.extend([
     328                  '-qt-xcb',
     329              ])
     330
     331          if '~webkit' in self.spec:
     332              config_args.extend([
     333                  '-skip', 'webengine',
     334              ])
     335
     336          configure('-no-eglfs',
     337                    '-no-directfb',
     338                    '-{0}gtk'.format('' if '+gtk' in self.spec else 'no-'),
  >> 339                    *config_args)

```
Error message
```
spack/opt/spack/linux-sles12-x86_64/gcc-4.8/dbus-1.11.2-suvndtddjsenlhtqycnsympatohyhyer/lib -ldbus-1 -qt-xcb

This is the Qt Open Source Edition.

You are licensed to use this software under the terms of
the GNU Lesser General Public License (LGPL) version 3.
You are also licensed to use this software under the terms of
the GNU General Public License (GPL) version 2.

You have already accepted the terms of the Open Source license.

Creating qmake...
gmake: Nothing to be done for 'first'.

ERROR: Unknown command line option '-ldbus-1'.
```

Thank You,
                 Manish
